ses_1_3.query: select isnull( ( ROUND(SUM( cast (Ratio_Live_Camera as Float) ) / COUNT(*), 2)),'0') avg FROM CSV_AVG where Location='CP_Office' and CAST(CONVERT(char(10),dt,126) AS DATE) = convert(char(10),dateadd(day,datediff(day,1,GETDATE()),0),126)
